body: Prerequisite: Samsaran subtype; Benefit: Members of this race with a Charisma score of 11 or higher gain the following spell-like abilities: 1/day—comprehend languages, deathwatch, stabilize. The caster level for these effects is equal to the user's character level.
name: Samsaran Magic
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Magical Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Samsaran Magic
